name: CataractSurgery
title: Cataract Surgery
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent cataract surgical procedures.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with cataract surgery.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
